presentationColumns.name: % Renewal Opportunity Line Revenue
presentationColumns.description: The % of Renewal Opportunity Line Revenue of the total Opportunity Line Revenue. This metric is computed as follows: (Renewal Opportunity Line Revenue / Opportunity Line Revenue)
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Revenue Line.% Renewal Opportunity Line Revenue in CX Currency

presentationColumns.name: % Renewal Open Opportunity Line Revenue
presentationColumns.description: The % of Renewal Open Opportunity Line Revenue of the total Open Opportunity Line Revenue. This metric is computed as follows: (Renewal Open Opportunity Line Revenue / Open Opportunity Line Revenue)
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Revenue Line.% Renewal Open Opportunity Line Revenue in CX Currency

presentationColumns.name: % Renewal Won Opportunity Line Revenue
presentationColumns.description: The % of Renewal Won Opportunity Line Revenue of the total Won Opportunity Line Revenue. This metric is computed as follows: (Renewal Won Opportunity Line Revenue / Won Opportunity Line Revenue)
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Revenue Line.% Renewal Won Opportunity Line Revenue in CX Currency

presentationColumns.name: % Renewal Lost Opportunity Line Revenue
presentationColumns.description: The % of Renewal Lost Opportunity Line Revenue of the total Lost Opportunity Line Revenue. This metric is computed as follows: (Renewal Lost Opportunity Line Revenue / Lost Opportunity Line Revenue)
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Revenue Line.% Renewal Lost Opportunity Line Revenue in CX Currency
